metadata.synopsis: Shadowheart reflects on how Viconia used the Justiciar helmet like a prop.

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: A Dark Justiciar helm. I wanted one of my own so badly... and the Mother Superior would always deny me.
0.context: NodeContext: Shar path - Wistful/old childhood longing

1.speaker: Shadowheart
1.text: A Dark Justiciar helm. I wanted one of my own so badly... hard to imagine, now.
1.context: NodeContext: Anti-Shar path - Old childhood longing, now an object of revulsion.
